demolition

类 Guy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Guy
  • 直接已知子类:
    BombGuy, Enemies

    public abstract class Guy
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean beKilled
      This value judges whether this guy is killed or not, if it is killed, the value is true, and the default is false
      boolean canMove
      Whether this guy can move, the default is true
      boolean moveDown
      Whether this guy can move (down), the default is false
      boolean moveLeft
      Whether this guy can move (left), the default is false
      boolean moveRight
      Whether this guy can move (right), the default is false
      boolean moveUp
      Whether this guy can move (up), the default is false
      static double SECONDS_BETWEEN_RENDERED
      The value is the cycle time of guy's image change

      Images of this guy

      Constructor for a Guy

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean canMove(App app)
      This method judges whether the guy can move based on the guy's current position and the expected next position If there is an obstruction, canMove is false, and the default is true
      abstract void direction(App app)
      This method is used for the guy to change accordingly as each frame advances (Used for guy's facing) The changes will be displayed in the app's window
      void draw(App app, processing.core.PImage sprite)
      This method is used to draw the guy's image in the app window
      void drawGuy(App app)
      This method is used to determine the image that the guy should display according to the current time The image will be periodically changed according to a specific display cycle
      int getX()
      This method is used to return the x value of the current position of this guy
      int getY()
      This method is used to return the y value of the current position of this guy
      abstract void tick(App app)
      This method is used for the guy to change accordingly as each frame advances (Used for guy's move) The changes will be displayed in the app's window

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Guy()
        Constructor for a Guy

      • Guy

        public Guy(int x,
           int y)
        Constructor for a guy, requires the location of the guy (X and Y value)
        参数:
        x - the location of the guy (X value)
        y - the location of the guy (Y value)

    • 方法详细资料

      • tick

        public abstract void tick(App app)
        This method is used for the guy to change accordingly as each frame advances (Used for guy's move) The changes will be displayed in the app's window
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • direction

        public abstract void direction(App app)
        This method is used for the guy to change accordingly as each frame advances (Used for guy's facing) The changes will be displayed in the app's window
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • drawGuy

        public void drawGuy(App app)
        This method is used to determine the image that the guy should display according to the current time The image will be periodically changed according to a specific display cycle
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • draw

        public void draw(App app,
                 processing.core.PImage sprite)
        This method is used to draw the guy's image in the app window
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program
        sprite - image of this guy

      • getX

        public int getX()
        This method is used to return the x value of the current position of this guy
        返回:
        x

      • getY

        public int getY()
        This method is used to return the y value of the current position of this guy
        返回:
        y

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(App app)
        This method judges whether the guy can move based on the guy's current position and the expected next position If there is an obstruction, canMove is false, and the default is true
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program
        返回:
        canMove
